body: My Japanese is shoddy at best so please excuse some mistakes I might make. Aight so basically mc is a tutor for this thick pink haired bitch and uses a hypnosis app on his phone to make her think that he is her boyfriend. She doesn't remember being hypnotized. She thinks mc is disgusting but while she is under the hypnosis she is more lovey dovey than cupid himself. They smash a lot to the point that just thinking about the mc makes her unconsciously wet. She eventually talks to her boyfriend who doesn't satisfy her anymore and mc makes a move on her while she is not hypnotized, thats the thigh grab scene on page 28, he hypnotizes her one last time and they go at it while mc takes remembrance pictures as the chick, whos name is Mari I believe, calls him gross for staring at her. All in all, pretty good, art is fantastic and I do enjoy me some heart eyes. Overall, a nice one to do it too, even if you can't read japanese the art is nice. 8/10, happy fapping!
